A frontend application with a drag-and-drop interface for creating and editing diagrams
Support for multiple diagram types including flowcharts, organizational charts, and mind maps
Functionality to create new diagrams from scratch
Ability to edit existing diagrams by adding, removing, and modifying elements
Capability to adjust layout and styling of diagram elements
User interface with ghost white background for the main layout area
UI components styled with slate gray for detail elements
Backend API to manage diagram data persistence
Frontend fetches all diagram data dynamically from backend APIs
Backend connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Database schema to store diagram configurations, elements, and user preferences
API endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting diagrams
Authentication system to associate diagrams with user accounts
Real-time updates or refresh mechanisms when diagram changes occur
Package.json configured with `install:all` and `dev` scripts to manage full-stack development
